resources.string: Awal uffir n tnaka n yimayl
ALES AWENNEZ N WAWAL UFFIR N TNAKA N YIMAYL
Akken ad talseḍ awennez n wawal-ik uffi, seqdec lqem web n ProtonMail di protonmail.com
D awezɣi tulya n ugbur. Ttxil sermed Chrome
D awezɣi tulya n ugbur. Ttxil sebdded Chrome
Ur izmir ara ad d-yawi iznan
Ur izmir ara ad d-yawi talqayt iznan
Anekcum ar tnaka n yimayl ur yeddi ara
Ttbut n uqeddac mačči d tameɣtut
Yir awal uffir n tnaka n yimayl
Ur tjerrdeḍ ara iman-ik ar ProtonMail Android Beta
Asnas-ik Protonmail ur izmir ara ad yettwaseqdec arama yettwalqem
ProtonMail ur iqqin ara akka tura. Ttxil senqed addad amiran n https://protonstatus.com neɣ https://twitter.com/protonmail.
Anermis yettwasekles, ad yemtawi ticki tella tuqqna.
Imayl n unermis mačči d ameɣtu
Tuzna n yizen ur teddi ara. Iznan-ik ttawskelsen deg ukaram n irewwayen.
Ur izmir ara ad ilqem inermisen
Tebɣiḍ ad tekkseḍ akk iznan seg ukaram?
Awalen uffiren n tuqqna ur menṭaḍen ara
Izen %1$s ur yezmir ara ad yawi ugar n %2$d n tibzimin.
%d n tibzimin d mḍan afellay yettwasirgen
Amḍan afellay n ifuyla yeddan yewweḍ.
Amḍan afellay n teɣzi n ifuyla yeddan yewweḍ
Ugur di tmerna n ufaylu yettwafernen
S tidett? Ulac tuɣalin ar deffir.
Offline! Report will be submitted when online
The address \'%s\' is invalid and was removed
Ma ulac aɣilif, rnu xarsum yiwen n unermis
Akud n tagara yezmer kan ad yettwarnu ɣef yiznan iwgelhanen. Sbadu awal uffir i yinermisen ur nelli ara di ProtonMail.
Ifuyla yeddan ɣer-sen talast n %1$s. Amḍan amatu ahat %2$s.
Ur iqqin ara, yettwarna ar udras n uragu i tuzna d-iteddun...
Iɣewwaṛen ur yettwaskelsen ara - awal uffir n tuqqna mačči d tameɣtut
Iɣewwaṛen ur ttwaskelsen ara - imayl mačči d ameɣtu
Snifel awal uffir n tnaka n yimayl
Sbadu awal uffis i uwgelhen n yizen-agi i yiseqdacen ur yellin ara di ProtonMail
Awal uffir n tnaka n yimayl amaynut
Sentem awal uffir n tnaka n yimayl amiran
Awal uffir n tuqqna amaynut yettwasekles
Awal uffir n tnaka n yimayl amaynut yettwasekles
Yir isem n uskan. \'>\' and \'<\' ur ttwasirgen ara
Tamawt: Ayagi yettwaseqdac i ugelhen d uzmak n yiznan-ik. Ur sṛuḥuy ara awal-agi uffir, ur nezmir ara ad t-id-nerr. Ma tesruḥeḍ awal-ik uffir, ur tettizmired ara ad teɣreḍ imaylen-ik.
Tamawt: Isem n useqdac d tansa-ik ProtonMail
By using ProtonMail, you agree to our\n terms and conditions and privacy policy
Aswir meqqern ugar n uuwgelhen yellan. Yezmer ad yawi ddeqs n tisdatin.
Tabzimt ur tettwarna ara imi isem mačči d ameɣtu.
Mudd udem i tigawin n uḍummu
Ur izmir ara ad yerr/ad isiweḍ, izen ur yettwazen ara.
Ma ulac aɣilif, sebded iminig akken ad tfakeḍ tigawt-agi
Ulac asnas yettwafen akken ad isefrek tigawt-agi
No app found to handle this action or invalid URL
Error while deleting some messages. Some of the selected messages are in sending process?!
Timerna n ufaylu yeddan ar yizen ur teddi ara
Timerna n tewlaft ur teddi ara
Maximum length for a username is %d characters!
Tansa imayl n tririt tafrayant ad k-teǧǧ ad talseḍ awennez n wawal-ik uffir ma tettuḍ-ṭ.
Ticki tuzneḍ imayl, d isem ara d-ibanen deg urti amazan.
Amiḍan-ik amaynut n yimaylen iwgelhanen yers, udiɣ ihegga i tuzna d urmas i yiznan iwgelhanen.
Tzemreḍ ad terreɣ imussuten n uḍummu d idmawanen, deg uɣewwaṛen n usnas ProtonMail.
Create and add Labels to organize your inbox. Press and hold down on a message for all options.

Your inbox is now protected with end-to-end encryption. To automatically send secure emails to your contacts, invite them to use ProtonMail! You can also manually encrypt messages to them if they don\'t use ProtonMail.
Iznan i tuzneḍ zemren ad ttwacerḍen i tukksa tawurmant seld kra n wakud.
You can get help and support at protonmail.com/support. Bugs can also be reported with the app.
Tuzna n tengalt n usenqed tecceḍ
Awal uffir yettwakecmen mačči d ameɣtu
Please wait %d seconds to click again
Awal uffir n yizen ur immid ara.
Access to this account is disabled due to non-payment. Please sign in through protonmail.com to pay your unpaid invoice.
Mobile signups are temporarily disabled. Please try again later, or try signing up at protonmail.com using a desktop or laptop computer.
Ur izmir ara ad d-isider afaylu yeddan
Imaylen yellan dagi ad ten-tafeḍ di Akk imaylen
Sekcem tangalit-ik PIN akken ad tserḥeḍ i tanaka-ik n urmas
Sekcem tangalit-ik PIN akken ad tserḥeḍ i yizen-ik
PIN mačči d ameɣtu, sekcem PIN s 4 n izwilen
Tangalt PIN n usentem ur tmenṭaḍ ara
%s yettwasider akken iwata deg umsefrak n ifuyla
%s ur yessaweḍ ara ad d-isider akken iwata

resources.string: Are you sure you want to logout with current account and proceed using %s?
ProtonMail is free and open source
We need your support to continue protecting privacy and improving ProtonMail

Tawsa-ik ad ɣ-d-mudd afus ad nessali tazmert udiɣ ad nkemmel ad nesnefli ProtonMail akken ad yeqqim d aseɣzan ilelli d aɣbalu yeldin. S useqdec neɣ tallelt n tmezdagnut-nneɣ, ad nizmir ad nkemmel asuffeɣ n ProtonMail ar umaḍal meṛṛa.
Fren tallayt n tewsa neɣ sekcem tallyt tebɣiḍ
Tal taɣawsa tella di tikci-nneɣ n baṭel
I tikciyin s wugar n usekles, sali aswir n umiḍan-ik seg ugrudem web n ProtonMail.
Thank you for being a paid user!
ProtonMail is a free service for the public good. You can help support online privacy by selecting a paid account.
Amiḍan azadur s talast n timahilin
Imiḍanen uzzigen i wid i ɣ-d-yettmuddun afus
Imiḍanen uzzigen i wid i ɣ-d-yettmuddun afus
Azen arama d 1000 n yiznan deg ass
Azen iznan iwgelhanen ar iɣerwaḍen izɣarayen
Ttekki deg ufran n timahilin timaynutin s tifranin i wid yesɣan tikci Visionary
ad d-yeddu ar zdat i tuddsiwin ara yizmiren ad tfarṣen tagnit seg imaylen iwgelhanen!
By clicking Submit, you agree to abide by\nProtonMail\'s terms and conditions
You will need to login to your PayPal account to complete this transaction. We will open new browser window with PayPal for you.
We are now upgrading your account, please wait a moment. Thank you for your support!
Your support is essential to keeping ProtonMail running. Thank you for supporting internet privacy!
Ɣur-k: Ur d-muddeḍ ara imayl n tririt, tiririt ur tezmir ara ad d-ḍru ma yella tettuḍ awal-ik uffir. Tebɣiḍ ad tkemmleḍ s war imayl n tririt?
An error occurred while trying to verify your payment method. Please try again or switch to another card.
Payment method verification cancelled. Please try again or switch to another card.
Payment method already used for this payment. Please check status of your subscription.
Ur ɣur-k ara tarrayin n lexlaṣ yettwaskelsen.
Qqen s protonmail akken ad tbeddleḍ talɣut n ufeter.
Tansa imayl ur tmenṭaḍ ara neɣ mačči d tameɣtut
Ma yermed uɣewwaṛ-agi, asnas ad yemtawi d uqeddac deg ugilal. Ma yensa, ad nsen yilɣa push.
Ma ulac aɣilif, fren kan Inermisen n Tiliɣri idiganen
Ma ulac aɣilif, sali aswir akken ad tesqedceḍ awgelhen n telɣut n unermis.
Tuccḍiwin n tririt n telɣut talqut n unermes tawgelhant.
Tuffɣeḍ. Ma ulac aɣilif, qqen tikelt-nniḍen.
Yella ubeddel ur yettwaskelsen ara. Tebɣiḍ ad ten-teǧǧeḍ?
Request timed out, please try again
Akaram ur yettwarna imi isem mačči d ameɣtu.
Izen %1$s ur yezmir ara ad yawi ugar n %2$d n tibzimin.
This email seems to be from a ProtonMail address but came from outside our system and failed our authentication requirements. It may be spoofed or improperly forwarded!
This email has failed its domain\'s authentication requirements. It may be spoofed or improperly forwarded!
Izen-agi yezmer ad yili d aneɛruḍ n ukellex. Ttxil-k senqed amazan akked ugbur iwakken ad tḥeqqqeḍ belli d izerfanen. ISSIN UGAR
Asenqed n uzmul n ugbur-agi yecceḍ
Ali ar lqem s yidrimen akken ad tazneḍ neɣ ad d-remseḍ imaylen seg tansa-ik %s.
Ayagi ad isali inermisen idiganen deg ibenk-ik ɣer ukaram ProtonMail. Ad tizmireḍ ihi ad tkecmeḍ ɣer inermisen agi deg ibenkan-nniḍen s ProtonMail.
Tansa n yimayl mačči d tameɣtut i kra n inermisen-ik
Tuzna n iznan seg @pm.me d tamahilt s uxeles. Izen-inek ad itwazen seg tansa-inek tamezwart %s
Leqem γer lqem s uxeles akken ad tesbaduḍ tansa-inek tamezwart %s
Sbadu amḍan afellay n talunt n usekles ProtonMail i tzemreḍ ad tesqedceḍ deg ibenk-inek aziraz.
Tulya n tugniwin igebren ur teddi ara. Ttxil senqed tuqna-inek n uẓeṭṭa.
Tulya n tugniwin igebren ur teddi ara.
Tebɣiḍ ad tazneḍ s tsarut ur nettwaḍmen ara?
Tremdeḍ asenqed n tansa s tsarut ittwaḍemnen i %s, maca ulac tasarut ittwaḍemnen n uwgelhen iremden.
Tebɣiḍ ad talseḍ azmul i unermis?

Asenqed n %s yecceḍ: anermis ur yettwazmel ara akken iwata. Isefk ad tzemleḍ tikkelt-nniḍen anermis iwakken ad tazneḍ izen ɣer tansa-agi neɣ ad tẓergeḍ anermis. Ayagi daɣen yezmer ad d-iḍru ticki terriḍ-d awal n uɛeddi inek neɣ tulseḍ awennez n tsura.
Tuzneḍ-t s yiman-ik s uwgelhen si ṭerf ar ṭerf
Sent by ProtonMail with zero access encryption
Izen ittuwegelhen s PGP yekka-d seg tansa yettusneqden
Izen ittuzemlen s PGP yekka-d seg tansa yettusneqden
Izen ittwawegelhen seg tazwara ar tagara
Izen ittwawegelhen seg tazwara ar tagara yekka-d seg tansa yettusneqden
Ittwawegelhen seg tazwara ar tagara ar tansa yettusneqden
Recipient could not be found: %s and it has been removed
An error occurred while retrieving recipient information and the recipient has been removed: %s
Tesremdeḍ afati n yizen, maca mačči akka iɣerwaḍen i yezemren i wayagi.
Ttxil-k rnu awal n uɛeddi n yizen i iɣerwaḍn-agi:
Ttxil-k sexsi tuzzna PGP iwakken ad tesremdeḍ afati i iɣerwaḍen-agi:
Sit akken ibɣu yili iwakken ad tazneḍ s war afati i iɣerwaḍen-agi.
Ad d-yefk talɣut ɣef waddad n usider n ufaylu yeddan
Sken-d akk tigawin i d-iteddun am tulya n izen amaynut deffir ugdil
Sentem tuzna n uneqqis n phishing
Reporting a message as a phishing attempt will send the message to us, so we can analyze it and improve our filters. This means that we will be able to see the contents of the message in full.
Aneqqis yettwazen. Izen iruḥ ɣer yispamen.
Ur izmir ara ad yazen aneqqis
You can be simultaneously logged into an unlimited number of paid ProtonMail accounts and one free account.
Sali aswir ar uɣawas s lexlaṣ akken ad tkecmeḍ ar timahilin-agi premium
Talast n yimaylen deg ugraw tewweḍ
Efk-d isem i ugraw ma ulac aɣilif
Tɛeddaḍ tilist n usekles. Ulamek ara tazneḍ neɣ ad teṭṭfeḍ imaylen. Tekki akken ad teẓreḍ ugar.
Tewwḍeḍ 100% n uḥraz i tzemreḍ. Ur tettizmireḍ ara ad tazneḍ neɣ ad teṭṭfeḍ imaylen alamma tekkseḍ kra n yimaylen neɣ txelṣeḍ ugar n uḥraz.
Tewwḍeḍ 90% n wayen i tzemreḍ ad tḥerzeḍ. Xemmem ad tserrḥeḍ i kra n tallunt neɣ ad txellṣeḍ ugar n uḥraz send ad txaṣeḍ akettur.
Akken ad ternuḍ ifuyla yeddan, ilaq ad tessirgeḍ akeccum ar tkatut n uḥraz.
Ilɣa Push i ProtonMail ur teddun ara wer alqem n imeẓla Google Play.
Changing the Mobile Signature is allowed to Paid users only
Iɣewwaren n uṭenṭen n usmekti yettwasihlen

resources.string: Ilɣa ad d-uɣalen di %1$d n isragen d %2$d n tisdatin
Asmekti arurad d uṭenṭen n usmekti remden
Asmekti arurad d uṭenṭen n usmekti nsan

When this option is enabled, messaged bodies will be automatically downloaded each time you receive a new email notification (this will consume more data). If this option is not enabled, message bodies will only be downloaded when you open an email. (Note: with either option, if you clear the cache or log out, you will not be able to read message bodies while offline.)
Sken-d tugna tusliγt s wudem awurman
Turn this feature on to see the sender\nof the emails in the push notifications.
Turn this feature on to auto-lock your\napp and use a PIN code or fingerprint\nto unlock it.

In case Proton sites are blocked, this setting allows the app to try alternative network routing to reach Proton, which can be useful for bypassing firewalls or network issues. We recommend keeping this setting on for greater reliability.

In case Proton sites are blocked, this setting allows the app to try alternative network routing to reach Proton, which can be useful for bypassing firewalls or network issues. We recommend keeping this setting on for greater reliability. Learn more
Turn this feature on to auto-complete email addresses using contacts from all your logged in accounts.
Logged out from %1$s and signed in with %2$s
Ur tezmireḍ ara ad ternuḍ amiḍan n baṭṭel n Protonmail. Yiwen kan n umiḍan baṭṭel i tzemreḍ ad ternuḍ. Ttxil ffeɣ seg umiḍan-inek. inem nniḍe, neɣ beddel ɣer umiḍan n uxelles.

The account you are trying to add does not have generated keys. Please add this account as a first account on the app, or log in via the web version, to generate keys and then add it as a additional account in the app.

No internet connection - Please make sure that your internet connection is working.

Internet Service Provider (ISP) problem - Try connecting to Proton from a different network (or use ProtonVPN or Tor).

Government block - Your country may be blocking access to Proton. Try ProtonVPN (or any other VPN) or Tor to access Proton.

Antivirus interference - Temporarily disable or remove your antivirus software.

Proxy/Firewall interference - Disable any proxies or firewalls, or contact your network administrator.

Proton is down - Check Proton Status for our system status.

Still can’t find a solution - Contact us directly through our support form, email (support@protonmail.com), or Twitter.
Tuccḍa deg usekles n yizen. ɛreḍ tikelt-nniḍen.
Seld leqqem aneggaru tigawin n uwehhi beddlent. Ma tebɣiḍ, tzemreḍ ad tenterreḍ akken llant deg iɣewwaṛen.
Tasarut API i Firebase d mačči d tameɣtut. Ilɣuten push ur tteddun ara.
Yecceḍ usekles n urewway deg uẓeṭṭa i yizen: \"%s\"
Ur izmir ara ad ildi izen-a mi ara yettwazen
